Detailed Description

A Javascript object.

See also:
flusspferd::create_object()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Define multiple properties.

Example: 

   obj.define_properties(read_only_property)("name1", value1)("name2", value2)("name3");
Parameters:
attr The property attributes.

bool flusspferd::object::is_generator (  )  const

Check if the object is a generator (i.e.

return from a function which uses yield). Due to limitations in the current Spidermonkey API there is a very small chance this cant return true erroneously, but only if someone has gone out of their way to make it happen.

Returns:
Whether the object is a generator.
bool flusspferd::object::is_null (  )  const

Returns:
Whether the object is null.
